item.title: Due date to file Form 64A and 64E for AY 2025-26 has been preponed to 15th June 2025. The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT), vide Notification No. 17/2025 dated 24th February, 2025, has amended Rule 12CA and Rule 12CC, changing the due date for submitting Form 64A and Form 64E by business and securitisation trusts from 30th November to 15th June of the following Financial Year.
